entries.meaning: A hand tool used to prepare a workpiece prior to drilling a hole. It typically compresses and then suddenly releases a spring, creating a small indentation that, in turn, guides and centers the drill.
The indentation left by such a tool.

verbs.description: centerpunch (third-person singular simple present centerpunches, present participle centerpunching, simple past and past participle centerpunched)

entries.meaning: To prepare a workpiece for drilling by using a centerpunch to create an indentation.
To place something directly in the middle.
